products.name: Computer
products.description: Powerful desktop computer with a high-performance processor, ample RAM, and large storage capacity. Equipped with a sleek design, vibrant display, and advanced graphics for seamless multimedia experiences. Ideal for gaming, content creation, and demanding tasks.

products.name: Smart phone
products.description: Sleek smartphone featuring a powerful processor, expansive storage, and a vivid display. Packed with advanced camera capabilities, long-lasting battery life, and seamless connectivity options. Ideal for multitasking, capturing high-quality photos, and staying connected on the go.

products.name: Printer
products.description: High-performance printer with fast printing capabilities, sharp resolution, and versatile connectivity options. Designed for efficient document handling, it offers user-friendly features, such as wireless printing and intuitive controls. Ideal for home offices or businesses requiring reliable and professional-quality printing.

products.name: Computer
products.description: Portable laptop with a lightweight design, powerful processor, and long-lasting battery life. Features a vibrant display, ample storage, and convenient connectivity options. Perfect for on-the-go productivity, multitasking, and entertainment.
